https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/k25yk9yRVW4XgTD10U5Y14pKGKo.jpg After a police raid, commanding officer Alberto has confiscated a large sum of money from a powerful drug dealer named Bartolomé. Bartolomé is pure evil and wants his money back, so he makes a plan to recover his money that involves kidnapping Alberto's son and forcing Alberto's wife, a famous runner, to run the local marathon. Bajo Amenaza: 42 km. de angustia
